title: China accelerates AI development push to challenge US tech dominance
description: Artificial intelligence competition between U.S. and China intensifies as both nations race for technological leadership.
content:
What was once an American-led innovation race has become a high-stakes competition over economic power, national security and technological leadership.
FOX Business’ Madison Alworth joined Maria Bartiromo on "Mornings with Maria" to report on how Ame... [2510 chars]

title: Musk’s X probed by UK over Grok’s thousands of sexualized images
description: UK regulators have opened a probe into Elon Musk's X as backlash mounts worldwide over the thousands of sexually suggestive images generated by the artificial intelligence tool Grok on the social media platform.
content:
(Bloomberg/Amy Thomson) — UK regulators have opened a probe into Elon Musk’s X as backlash mounts worldwide over the thousands of sexually suggestive images generated by the artificial intelligence tool Grok on the social media platform.

title: Apple to use Google’s Gemini AI for revamped Siri under multi-year deal
description: Apple will use Google’s Gemini artificial intelligence models to power its revamped Siri voice assistant under a multi-year partnership, deepening ties between the two tech giants as competition intensifies in the global AI race.
content:
Apple will use Google’s Gemini models for its revamped Siri coming later this year under a multi-year deal that deepens the tech giants’ alliance in the artificial intelligence era and bolsters Alphabet’s position in the race against OpenAI.
The deal... [1556 chars]

title: Alphabet’s rise to $4 trillion cements status as AI trade winner
description: Alphabet Inc. broke above a $4 trillion market capitalization on Monday, becoming one of the few companies to ever cross the threshold as investors increasingly see the Google parent as one of the biggest winners of the artificial intelligence boom.
content:

title: Google confirms multiyear AI deal to power Apple models, Siri
description: Alphabet Inc.'s Google confirmed that it has entered a multiyear deal with Apple Inc. to power the iPhone maker's artificial intelligence technology, including the Siri voice assistant.
content:

title: Alphabet becomes fourth company to hit $4 trillion valuation - How Apple’s AI decision helped in this new milestone
description: Alphabet joins the $4 trillion club after AI resurgence, Apple’s Gemini partnership, strong stock rally, and investor confidence, highlighting Google’s leadership in artificial intelligence markets.
content: Alphabet, the parent company of Google, has become the fourth company in the world to be worth $4 trillion. This happened soon after its share price rose about 1% on Monday. Alphabet’s shares went up after Apple said it had chosen Google’s Gemini tec... [2732 chars]

content:
